review.reviewBody: My favourite place to order from!! Expansive menu, excellent quality, great prices and a home cooked feel on many of their dishes. Sooo great! Thanks for all the great meals, I order from here at least once a week ! Tiramisu to die for!
everything was great, hot, well cooked. thankyou very much!

We had 2 Chicken Parmesans.  Good chicken with tasty sauce.  Spaghetti side dish was tasty but a little undercooked.  Lasagna side dish was great.  Garlic bread not that tasty TBH.   But overall good.
lasagna was decent, lots of cheese! However, it could of had a bit more flavor

I always enjoy this restaurant I ordered spanakopita last time it was good but I think they use canned spinach so once it is baked it's like mush inside I prefer to have some texture   Taste was good and I love their Greek salad maybe they could splurge on more than one olive though
